verses.verse: When he was come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from the mountain, <S%G3735><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him.

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> there came <S%G2064><s%> a leper <S%G3015><s%> and worshipped <S%G4352><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you will, <S%G2309><s%> you can <S%G1410><s%> make <S%G2511><s%> me clean. <S%G2513><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> put <S%G1614><s%> forth <S%G1614><s%> his hand, <S%G5495><s%> and touched <S%G680><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> I will; <S%G2309><s%> be you clean. <S%G2513><s%> And immediately <S%G2112><s%> his leprosy <S%G3014><s%> was cleansed. <S%G2511><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, See <S%G3708><s%> you tell <S%G2036><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> man; <S%G3367><s%> but go <S%G5217><s%> your way, show <S%G1166><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> to the priest, <S%G2409><s%> and offer <S%G4374><s%> the gift <S%G1435><s%> that Moses <S%G3475><s%> commanded, <S%G4367><s%> for a testimony <S%G3142><s%> to them.
And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> there came <S%G4334><s%> to him a centurion, <S%G1543><s%> beseeching <S%G3870><s%> him,

And saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> my servant <S%G3816><s%> lies <S%G906><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> home <S%G3614><s%> sick <S%G3885><s%> of the palsy, <S%G3885><s%> grievously <S%G1171><s%> tormented. <S%G928><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, I will come <S%G2064><s%> and heal <S%G2323><s%> him.

The centurion <S%G1543><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G5346><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not worthy <S%G2425><s%> that you should come <S%G1525><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> my roof: <S%G4721><s%> but speak <S%G2036><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> and my servant <S%G3816><s%> shall be healed. <S%G2390><s%>

For I am <S%G1510><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> authority, <S%G1849><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> soldiers <S%G4757><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> me: and I say <S%G3004><s%> to this <S%G5129><s%> man, Go, <S%G4198><s%> and he goes; <S%G4198><s%> and to another, <S%G243><s%> Come, <S%G2064><s%> and he comes; <S%G2064><s%> and to my servant, <S%G1401><s%> Do <S%G4160><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> and he does <S%G4160><s%> it.

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, he marveled, <S%G2296><s%> and said <S%G4483><s%> to them that followed, <S%G190><s%> Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, I have not found <S%G2147><s%> so <S%G5118><s%> great <S%G5118><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> no, <S%G3761><s%> not in Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

And I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That many <S%G4183><s%> shall come <S%G2240><s%> from the east <S%G395><s%> and west, <S%G1424><s%> and shall sit <S%G347><s%> down <S%G347><s%> with Abraham, <S%G11><s%> and Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

But the children <S%G5207><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> shall be cast <S%G1544><s%> out into <S%G1519><s%> outer <S%G1857><s%> darkness: <S%G4655><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall be weeping <S%G2805><s%> and gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G4483><s%> to the centurion, <S%G1543><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> your way; and as you have believed, <S%G4100><s%> so be it done <S%G1096><s%> to you. And his servant <S%G3816><s%> was healed <S%G2390><s%> in the selfsame <S%G1565><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%>

And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Peter's <S%G4074><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> his wife's <S%G3994><s%> mother <S%G3994><s%> laid, <S%G906><s%> and sick <S%G4445><s%> of a fever. <S%G4445><s%>
And he touched <S%G680><s%> her hand, <S%G5495><s%> and the fever <S%G4446><s%> left <S%G863><s%> her: and she arose, <S%G1453><s%> and ministered <S%G1247><s%> to them.

When the even <S%G3798><s%> was come, <S%G1096><s%> they brought <S%G4374><s%> to him many <S%G4183><s%> that were possessed <S%G1139><s%> with devils: <S%G1139><s%> and he cast <S%G1544><s%> out the spirits <S%G4151><s%> with his word, <S%G3056><s%> and healed <S%G2323><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that were sick: <S%G2192><s%>

That it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> by Esaias <S%G2268><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> our infirmities, <S%G769><s%> and bore <S%G941><s%> our sicknesses. <S%G3554><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> him, he gave <S%G2753><s%> commandment <S%G2753><s%> to depart <S%G565><s%> to the other <S%G4008><s%> side. <S%G4008><s%>

And a certain <S%G1520><s%> scribe <S%G1122><s%> came, <S%G4334><s%> and said <S%G4483><s%> to him, Master, <S%G1320><s%> I will follow <S%G190><s%> you wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1437><s%> you go. <S%G565><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, The foxes <S%G258><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> holes, <S%G5454><s%> and the birds <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> have nests; <S%G2682><s%> but the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> not where <S%G4226><s%> to lay <S%G2827><s%> his head. <S%G2776><s%>

And another <S%G2087><s%> of his disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G4483><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> suffer <S%G2010><s%> me first <S%G4412><s%> to go <S%G565><s%> and bury <S%G2290><s%> my father. <S%G3962><s%>
But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G4483><s%> to him, Follow <S%G190><s%> me; and let <S%G863><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> bury <S%G2290><s%> their dead. <S%G3498><s%>
And when he was entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship, <S%G4143><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him.

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> there arose <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> tempest <S%G4578><s%> in the sea, <S%G2281><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that the ship <S%G4143><s%> was covered <S%G2572><s%> with the waves: <S%G2949><s%> but he was asleep. <S%G2518><s%>
And his disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him, and awoke <S%G1453><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> us: we perish. <S%G622><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Why <S%G5101><s%> are you fearful, <S%G1169><s%> O you of little <S%G3640><s%> faith? <S%G3640><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> he arose, <S%G1453><s%> and rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the winds <S%G417><s%> and the sea; <S%G2281><s%> and there was a great <S%G3173><s%> calm. <S%G1055><s%>

But the men <S%G444><s%> marveled, <S%G2296><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G4217><s%> manner <S%G4217><s%> of man is this, <S%G3778><s%> that even <S%G2532><s%> the winds <S%G417><s%> and the sea <S%G2281><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> him!

And when he was come <S%G2064><s%> to the other <S%G4008><s%> side <S%G4008><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the country <S%G5561><s%> of the Gergesenes, <S%G1086><s%> there met <S%G5221><s%> him two <S%G1417><s%> possessed <S%G1139><s%> with devils, <S%G1139><s%> coming <S%G1831><s%> out of the tombs, <S%G3419><s%> exceeding <S%G3029><s%> fierce, <S%G5467><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that no <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> might <S%G2480><s%> pass <S%G3928><s%> by that way. <S%G3598><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> they cried <S%G2896><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> have we to do with you, Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> you Son <S%G5207><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%> are you come <S%G2064><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> to torment <S%G928><s%> us before <S%G4253><s%> the time? <S%G2540><s%>
And there was a good <S%G3112><s%> way <S%G3112><s%> off <S%G575><s%> from them an herd <S%G34><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> swine <S%G5519><s%> feeding. <S%G1006><s%>

So <S%G1161><s%> the devils <S%G1142><s%> sought <S%G3870><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> you cast <S%G1544><s%> us out, suffer <S%G2010><s%> us to go <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the herd <S%G34><s%> of swine. <S%G5519><s%>

And he said <S%G4483><s%> to them, Go. <S%G5217><s%> And when they were come <S%G1831><s%> out, they went <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the herd <S%G34><s%> of swine: <S%G5519><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> herd <S%G34><s%> of swine <S%G5519><s%> ran <S%G3729><s%> violently down <S%G2596><s%> a steep <S%G2911><s%> place into <S%G1519><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and perished <S%G599><s%> in the waters. <S%G5204><s%>

And they that kept <S%G1006><s%> them fled, <S%G5343><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> their ways into <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> thing, and what <S%G3588><s%> was befallen <S%G4876><s%> to the possessed <S%G1139><s%> of the devils. <S%G1139><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out to meet <S%G4877><s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%> and when they saw <S%G1492><s%> him, they sought <S%G3870><s%> him that he would depart <S%G3327><s%> out of their coasts. <S%G3725><s%>
